verses.text: And the \sc Lord\sc* spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
Every man of the children of Israel shall pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their fatherâ€™s house: far off about the tabernacle of the congregation shall they pitch.

And on the east side toward the rising of the sun \add shall\add* they of the standard of the camp of Judah pitch throughout their armies: and Nahshon the son of Amminadab \add shall be\add* captain of the children of Judah.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred.
And those that do pitch next unto him \add shall be\add* the tribe of Issachar: and Nethaneel the son of Zuar \add shall be\add* captain of the children of Issachar.
And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, \add were\add* fifty and four thousand and four hundred.
\add Then\add* the tribe of Zebulun: and Eliab the son of Helon \add shall be\add* captain of the children of Zebulun.
And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, \add were\add* fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.

All that were numbered in the camp of Judah \add were\add* an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their armies. \add These\add* shall first set forth.
On the south side \add shall be\add* the standard of the camp of Reuben according to their armies: and the captain of the children of Reuben \add shall be\add* Elizur the son of Shedeur.
And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, \add were\add* forty and six thousand and five hundred.
And those which pitch by him \add shall be\add* the tribe of Simeon: and the captain of the children of Simeon \add shall be\add* Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* fifty and nine thousand and three hundred.
Then the tribe of Gad: and the captain of the sons of Gad \add shall be\add* Eliasaph the son of Reuel.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* forty and five thousand and six hundred and fifty.

All that were numbered in the camp of Reuben \add were\add* an hundred thousand and fifty and one thousand and four hundred and fifty, throughout their armies. And they shall set forth in the second rank.

Then the tabernacle of the congregation shall set forward \add with\add* the camp of the Levites in the midst of the camp: as they encamp, so shall they set forward, every man in his place by their standards.
On the west side \add shall be\add* the standard of the camp of Ephraim according to their armies: and the captain of the sons of Ephraim \add shall be\add* Elishama the son of Ammihud.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* forty thousand and five hundred.
And by him \add shall be\add* the tribe of Manasseh: and the captain of the children of Manasseh \add shall be\add* Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* thirty and two thousand and two hundred.
Then the tribe of Benjamin: and the captain of the sons of Benjamin \add shall be\add* Abidan the son of Gideoni.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* thirty and five thousand and four hundred.
All that were numbered of the camp of Ephraim \add were\add* an hundred thousand and eight thousand and an hundred, throughout their armies. And they shall go forward in the third rank.
The standard of the camp of Dan \add shall be\add* on the north side by their armies: and the captain of the children of Dan \add shall be\add* Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* threescore and two thousand and seven hundred.
And those that encamp by him \add shall be\add* the tribe of Asher: and the captain of the children of Asher \add shall be\add* Pagiel the son of Ocran.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* forty and one thousand and five hundred.
Then the tribe of Naphtali: and the captain of the children of Naphtali \add shall be\add* Ahira the son of Enan.
And his host, and those that were numbered of them, \add were\add* fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
All they that were numbered in the camp of Dan \add were\add* an hundred thousand and fifty and seven thousand and six hundred. They shall go hindmost with their standards.

These \add are\add* those which were numbered of the children of Israel by the house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their hosts \add were\add* six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.
But the Levites were not numbered among the children of Israel; as the \sc Lord\sc* commanded Moses.

And the children of Israel did according to all that the \sc Lord\sc* commanded Moses: so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to the house of their fathers.
